member.name: T:TranslatorService.DefaultTokenProvider
member.summary: Client to call Cognitive Services Azure Auth Token service in order to get an access token.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.DefaultTokenProvider.OcpApimSubscriptionKeyHeader
member.summary: Name of header used to pass the subscription key to the token service

members.member: Gets or sets the URL of the token service.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.DefaultTokenProvider.TokenCacheDuration
member.summary: After obtaining a valid token, this class will cache it for this duration. Use a duration of 8 minutes, which is less than the actual token lifetime of 10 minutes.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.DefaultTokenProvider.SubscriptionKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the Service Subscription Key.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.DefaultTokenProvider.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,TranslatorService.Settings.TranslatorSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, that is used to obtain access token
member.param: The instance of used by the service.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.DefaultTokenProvider.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, that is used to obtain access token
member.param: The instance of used by the service.
Subscription key to use to get an authentication token.
The Azure region of the the Translator service, if any.
member.exception: The serviceUrl parameter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic) or empty.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.DefaultTokenProvider.GetAccessTokenAsync
member.summary: Gets a token for the specified subscription.
member.returns: The encoded JWT token prefixed with the string "Bearer ".
member.remarks: This method uses a cache to limit the number of request to the token service. A fresh token can be re-used during its lifetime of 10 minutes. After a successful request to the token service, this method caches the access token. Subsequent invocations of the method return the cached token for the next 8 minutes. After 8 minutes, a new token is fetched from the token service and the cache is updated.

member.name: T:TranslatorService.TranslatorServiceException
member.summary: The TranslatorServiceException class holds information about Exception related to or .

member.name: P:TranslatorService.TranslatorServiceException.Code
member.summary: Gets or sets the error status code.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.TranslatorServiceException.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified error message.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Authentication URI for the Speech service.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.ISpeechClient.TextToSpeechRequestUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the request URI for the Text-to-speech service.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.ISpeechClient.SpeechToTextRequestUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the request URI for the Speech-to-text service.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.ISpeechClient.SubscriptionKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the Subscription key that is necessary to use Microsoft Translator Service.

remarks.para: You must register Speech Service on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesSpeechServices to obtain the Speech Uri, Authentication Uri and Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.ISpeechClient.InitializeAsync
member.summary: Initializes the class by getting an access token for the service.
member.returns: A that represents the initialize operation.
member.exception: The provided isn't valid or has expired.
member.remarks: Calling this method isn't mandatory, because the token is get/refreshed everytime is needed. However, it is called at startup, it can speed-up subsequest requests.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.ISpeechClient.InitializeAsync(System.String,System.String)

member.returns: A that represents the initialize operation.
member.exception: The provided isn't valid or has expired.

remarks.para: Calling this method isn't mandatory, because the token is get/refreshed everytime is needed. However, it is called at startup, it can speed-up subsequest requests.

You must register Speech Service on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesSpeechServices to obtain the Speech Uri, Authentication Uri and Subscription key needed to use the service.

You must register Speech Service on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesSpeechServices to obtain the Speech Uri, Authentication Uri and Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: T:TranslatorService.ITranslatorClient
member.summary: The ITranslatorClient interface specifies properties and methods to translate text in various supported languages.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.ITranslatorClient.AuthenticationUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the Authentication URI for the Translator service.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.ITranslatorClient.SubscriptionKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the Subscription key that is necessary to use Microsoft Translator Service.

remarks.para: You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesTextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.ITranslatorClient.Region
member.summary: Gets or sets the the Azure region of the the Translator service.
member.remarks: This value is used to automatically set the property. If the paramter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic), the global service is used.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.ITranslatorClient.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the string representing the supported language code to translate the text in.
member.value: The string representing the supported language code to translate the text in. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method .

member.name: M:TranslatorService.ITranslatorClient.InitializeAsync
member.summary: Initializes the class by getting an access token for the global (non region-dependent) service, using the current language.
member.returns: A that represents the initialize operation.
member.exception: The provided isn't valid or has expired.
member.remarks: Calling this method isn't mandatory, because the token is get/refreshed everytime is needed. However, it is called at startup, it can speed-up subsequest requests.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.ITranslatorClient.InitializeAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the class by getting an access token for a specified region service, using the given language.
member.param: The subscription key for the Microsoft Translator Service on Azure.
The Azure region of the the Speech service. This value is used to automatically set the property. If the region paramter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic), the global service is used.

A string representing the supported language code to speak the text in. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method . If the language parameter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current language is used.
member.returns: A that represents the initialize operation.
member.exception: The provided isn't valid or has expired.

remarks.para: Calling this method isn't mandatory, because the token is get/refreshed everytime is needed. However, it is called at startup, it can speed-up subsequest requests.
You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesTextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.summary: Voice output formats.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.AudioOutputFormat.Raw8Khz8BitMonoMULaw
member.summary: raw-8khz-8bit-mono-mulaw request output audio format type.

member.summary: riff-16khz-16bit-mono-pcm request output audio format type.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.AudioOutputFormat.Ssml16Khz16BitMonoSilk
member.summary: ssml-16khz-16bit-mono-silk request output audio format type. It is a SSML with audio segment, with audio compressed by SILK codec

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.AudioOutputFormat.Raw16Khz16BitMonoTrueSilk
member.summary: raw-16khz-16bit-mono-truesilk request output audio format type. Audio compressed by SILK codec

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.AudioOutputFormat.Ssml16Khz16BitMonoTts
member.summary: ssml-16khz-16bit-mono-tts request output audio format type. It is a SSML with audio segment, and it needs tts engine to play out

member.name: T:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.Gender
member.summary: Gender of the voice.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.Gender.Female
member.summary: Female voice

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.Gender.Male
member.summary: Male voice

member.name: T:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionAlternative
member.summary: The class contains information about a recognition result.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionAlternative.Confidence
member.summary: The confidence score of the entry from 0.0 (no confidence) to 1.0 (full confidence)

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionAlternative.LexicalForm
member.summary: The lexical form of the recognized text: the actual words recognized.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionAlternative.CanonicalForm
member.summary: The inverse-text-normalized ("canonical") form of the recognized text, with phone numbers, numbers, abbreviations ("doctor smith" to "dr smith"), and other transformations applied.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionAlternative.MaskedCanonicalForm
member.summary: The ITN form with profanity masking applied, if requested.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionAlternative.Display
member.summary: The display form of the recognized text, with punctuation and capitalization added. This parameter is the same as provided when is set to .

member.name: T:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionResultFormat
member.summary: The RecognitionResultFormat enum specifies the result format.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionResultFormat.Simple
member.summary: The service returns only the top level information of the recognized text. This is the default.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionResultFormat.Detailed
member.summary: The service returns detailed recognition result.

member.name: T:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionStatus
member.summary: Recognition status.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionStatus.Success
member.summary: The recognition was successful and the DisplayText field will be present

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionStatus.NoMatch
member.summary: Speech was detected in the audio stream, but no words from the target language were matched

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionStatus.InitialSilenceTimeout
member.summary: The start of the audio stream contained only silence, and the service timed out waiting for speech

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionStatus.BabbleTimeout
member.summary: The start of the audio stream contained only noise, and the service timed out waiting for speech

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.RecognitionStatus.Error
member.summary: The recognition service encountered an internal error and could not continue

member.name: T:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechProfanityMode
member.summary: The SpeechProfanityMode enum defines the possible modes in which the service can handle profanity.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechProfanityMode.Masked
member.summary: The service masks profanity with an asterisk. This is the default.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechProfanityMode.Removed
member.summary: The service removes profanity.

member.name: F:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechProfanityMode.Raw
member.summary: The service does not remove or mask profanity.

member.name: T:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResponse
member.summary: The SpeechRecognitionResponse class contains information about a successful recognition operation.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResponse.RecognitionStatus
member.summary: A string indicating the result status. Successful requests will return "Success"

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResponse.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset. The Offset element specifies the offset (in 100-nanosecond units) at which the phrase was recognized, relative to the start of the audio stream.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResponse.Duration
member.summary: The duration of speech. The Duration element specifies the duration (in 100-nanosecond units) of this speech phrase.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResponse.DisplayText
member.summary: Gets or sets the top result (by confidence), returned in Display Form.
member.remarks: The display form adds punctuation and capitalization to recognition results, making it the most appropriate form for applications that display the spoken text.

member.name: P:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.SpeechRecognitionResponse.Alternatives
member.summary: A list of alternative interpretations of the same speech recognition result. These results are ranked from most likely to least likely The first entry is the same as the main recognition result.

member.name: T:TranslatorService.Models.Speech.TextToSpeechParameters
member.summary: Inputs Options for the TTS Service.

member.name: T:TranslatorService.SpeechClient
member.summary: The SpeechClient class provides methods for text-to-speech and speech-to-text

remarks.para: To use this class, you must register Speech Sercvice on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesSpeechServices to obtain the Subscription key.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.SpeechClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using an existing .
member.param: An instance of the object to use to network communication.

remarks.para: You must register Speech Service on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesSpeechServices to obtain the Speech Uri, Authentication Uri and Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.SpeechClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The Subscription Key to use the service (it must be created in the specified ).
The Azure region of the the Speech service. This value is used to automatically set the , and properties.

remarks.para: You must register Speech Service on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesSpeechServices to obtain the Speech Uri, Authentication Uri and Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.SpeechClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.String,System.String)

The Subscription Key to use the service (it must be created in the specified ).
The Azure region of the the Speech service. This value is used to automatically set the , and properties.

remarks.para: You must register Speech Service on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesSpeechServices to obtain the Speech Uri, Authentication Uri and Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: T:TranslatorService.TranslatorClient
member.summary: The TranslatorClient class provides methods to translate text in various supported languages.

remarks.para: To use this class, you must register Translator Service on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesTextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.TranslatorClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the global (non region-dependent) service and the current language.
member.param: The Subscription Key to use the service.

remarks.para: You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesTextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.TranslatorClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using an existing , the global (non region-dependent) service and the current language.
member.param: An instance of the object to use to network communication.
The Subscription Key to use the service.

remarks.para: You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesTextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.TranslatorClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specified region service, using the given language.
member.param: The Subscription Key to use the service.
The Azure region of the the Speech service. This value is used to automatically set the property. If the region paramter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic), the global service is used.

The string representing the supported language code to translate the text in. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method . If the language parameter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current language is used.

remarks.para: You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesTextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.TranslatorClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,TranslatorService.Settings.TranslatorSettings,TranslatorService.ITokenProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specified region service, using an existing and the given language.
member.param: An instance of the object to use to network communication.

remarks.para: You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesTextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: M:TranslatorService.TranslatorClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,System.String,System.String,System.String,TranslatorService.ITokenProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specified region service, using an existing and the given language.
member.param: An instance of the object to use to network communication.
The Subscription Key to use the service.
The Azure region of the the Speech service. This value is used to automatically set the property. If the region paramter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic), the global service is used.

The string representing the supported language code to translate the text in. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method . If the language parameter is null (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current language is used.

remarks.para: You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServicesTextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

member.name: T:System.Net.Http.PushStreamContent
member.summary: Provides an implementation that exposes an output which can be written to directly. The ability to push data to the output stream differs from the where data is pulled and not pushed.

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.PushStreamContent.#ctor(System.Action{System.IO.Stream,System.Net.Http.HttpContent,System.Net.TransportContext})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The action is called when an output stream has become available allowing the action to write to it directly. When the stream is closed, it will signal to the content that is has completed and the HTTP request or response will be completed.
member.param: The action to call when an output stream is available.

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.PushStreamContent.#ctor(System.Func{System.IO.Stream,System.Net.Http.HttpContent,System.Net.TransportContext,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The action to call when an output stream is available. The stream is automatically closed when the return task is completed.

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.PushStreamContent.#ctor(System.Action{System.IO.Stream,System.Net.Http.HttpContent,System.Net.TransportContext},System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given media type.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given media type.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given .

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given .

member.name: T:System.Net.Http.PushStreamContent.AsyncVoid
member.summary: Used as the T in a "conversion" of a Task into a Task{T}

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.PushStreamContent.SerializeToStreamAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Net.TransportContext)
member.summary: When this method is called, it calls the action provided in the constructor with the output stream to write to. Once the action has completed its work it closes the stream which will close this content instance and complete the HTTP request or response.
member.param: The to which to write.
The associated .
member.returns: A instance that is asynchronously serializing the object's content.

member.name: M:System.Net.Http.PushStreamContent.TryComputeLength(System.Int64@)
member.summary: Computes the length of the stream if possible.
member.param: The computed length of the stream.
member.returns: true if the length has been computed; otherwise false.

member.name: T:System.Net.Http.DelegatingStream
member.summary: Stream that delegates to inner stream. This is taken from System.Net.Http
